text: One Wild Night Live 1985-2001 is a live album from American hard rock band Bon Jovi released on 22 May, 2001. The album includes live covers of Rockin' in the Free World and I Don't Like Mondays. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom and number 20 in the United States. ==Track listing== Category:2001 albums Category:Bon Jovi albums
